value.title: 9 things to know before getting into Power BI (Or, really anything)
value.excerpt: We share 9 things to know before starting your journey with Power BI. Really this applies to anything...   Power BI User Groups: https://www.pbiusergroup.com/  *** Social Media Resources *** Power BI Community: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/search?q=%23powerbi&src=typed_query

value.title: Blend Power BI datasets with Excel files? INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The moment you've been waiting for! What Marco Russo calls the holy grail of BI. Tessa Hurr walks us through the new DirectQuery over Power BI datasets feature in the December 2020 release.  Connect with Tessa on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tessahurr  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Create a Power BI Template file in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick shows you how to export a Power BI Template file and then use that to create a new Power BI report within Power BI Desktop.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server
value.excerpt: Create Power BI reports in Power BI Report Server  In this video, I walk through the steps to create your Power BI Report in order to publish it to Power BI Report Server. This involves downloading and installing Power BI Desktop optimized for Power BI Report Server and connecting to Analysis Services

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. Marco helps to break down a DAX measure and show how you can see the results as you build it up to find where the problem is.  SQL BI https://sqlbi.com  DAX Formatter https://www.daxformatter.com/

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful

value.title: Finding the lowest value and highlighting in DAX | Power BI

value.title: How do you conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI Report?
value.excerpt: There are different interactions Power BI visuals can have, but how do we conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI report using a slicer? value.title: Working with images in Power BI

value.title: Power BI Pivot: Move Data from Rows to Columns #Q&A
value.excerpt: I am a huge fan of Unpivot (moving data from Column to Rows), but sometimes Pivot is your friend, when you need to move data from Rows to Columns. If you're getting this error "There were too many elements in the enumeration to complete the operation. " trying to Pivot in Power BI, watch this video.

value.title: Combine Multiple or All Sheets from an Excel File into a Power BI solution Using Power Query Dynamic
value.excerpt: Combining multiple files from one folder is already supported built-in through the graphical interface of Power Query when use you Get Data from Folder. However, if you have one Excel file, with multiple sheets with the same structure but different data, you cannot use that option. There is a very little

value.title: DirectQuery Connection in Power BI How does it work Limitations and Advantages

This type of connection is only supported by a limited number of data sources, and mainly targets systems with a huge amount of

value.title: Extract Parts of a Text Value in Power BI using a Delimiter Power Query Transformation
value.excerpt: If you have a text field and you want to extract a part of that text field, there are multiple ways to do that. You can do this using the SUBSTRING function in DAX. However, These types of actions are better to be done using Power Query transformations. Fortunately, Power Query is very easy and simple

value.title: Using ALLEXCEPT vs ALL VALUES
value.excerpt: ALLEXCEPT is a handy DAX function to retrieve all the columns of a table except for some. When used as a CALCULATE modifier, its behavior is less intuitive and might result in inaccurate measures. In this video, we elaborate on the most common mistake when using ALLEXCEPT in CALCULATE. Article and download:

value.title: When to use KEEPFILTERS over iterators

value.title: Work with Power BI visuals
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose from the exceptional visuals that Power BI makes available to you. Formatting visuals will direct the user’s attention to exactly where you want it, while helping to make the visual easier to read and interpret. You will also learn about how to use key performance indicators (KPIs).

value.title: Avoid refresh errors with missing columns in Power BI/Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns.  I learnt this by watching Microsoft Power BI webinar with Chris Webb: https://info.microsoft.com/CO-PowerBI-WBNR-FY16-06Jun-21-Amazing-Things-with-Power-BI-Registration.html?Is=Website
